author: Amit Pundir
comment: Android wear 2.0 compatibility broke this watchface on my original moto360. Too bad, I used to love this watchface :(

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Amit. Can you provide more details (picture)? Our address: sayhello@stettiner.eu. Thanks in advance.

author: Walker Lawrence
comment: Been using for half a day and like it generally. It needs refinement but I get the sense the developer intends to improve it

author: siddiq budiutomo
comment: should have options for night mode. not everyone love the bright green

author: George Conklin
comment: Won't install. Getting refund

author: chris crs
comment: (previous comment deleted). Can you add optional watch hands with something darker or phosporic greenish? Current white hand dial looks unreal. adding watch battery level and weather related are always welcome

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Chris. Probably, the battery level of your watch or phone is too low, to run successful synchronization. Please make sure that battery level is 60%+ and force android wear app on your phone to make the synchro. Please note, that SpecOps is only visible on your watch (no icon on phone). Hope it will help and you will give us more than 2 stars :)

title: Suggestions

comment: The date doesn't quite site right in the box. Seems like a low res watch face. Numbers look blurry. Was hoping to like this more. Screen caps make it look nice.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Nick. Thanks for the feedback. We know about "date position" issue, will try to fix it, when updating the app. PS Please note that resolution of the device isn't high as well ;)

author: frank mohr
comment: I must read more from developer why Numbers are upside down. Its a nice face just my preferences do not match the developer.  I therefore revised ratings give it a just OK just nice  i am happy developer is paying attention and maybe they will offer either or numbers Good luck guys.
title: Good watch face

author: Vasily CREAM
comment: Additionally to Google Now cards being semi-transparent instead of opaque, it will be good to have discrete seconds hand movement option (for even lower power consumption). Otherwise, great watchface, keep up the good work!

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Vasily. Thanks for a positive feedback. Will consider your idea, when updating the app :)

title: Possible improvements

author: William Somar
comment: Different faces 1) long press watch face 2) scroll to Spec Ops 3) select small settings cogwheel. As others have said, lacks shadows so looks a little flat. Would like to see "night" triggered by night and not by dim mode. Also a different colored "tritium" pellet for the 12 position. (Like on Luminox watches) Look forward to upcoming improvments.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey William. Thanks for your valuable feedback. Will keep your ideas in mind, when updating this watch face.

title: Works on LG Urbane

author: D Nguyễn
comment: The image is much cleaner now and sharper than before. Battery drain seems to be minimal which is good.  Still could use a bit more tweaking.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey. We have just upgraded SpecOps Watch Face. Now, there are 6 faces to choose from :) They are sharper now, as requested. Hope you will like one of them. If so, please consider giving us more "stars" :)

title: Better

author: joel serrano
comment: pretty sweet watch face. not sure how to get the cool night mode on though, can anyone help me out with that??

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Joel. Thanks for the purchase and positive rating. We call "ambient mode" the night mode. Please make sure, that you have "ambient mode" enabled on your Android Wear Watch - you will find such an option in settings (Watch). Please let us know if you have succeeded (sayhello@stettiner.eu) :)

author: David Onsted
comment: A good, serviceable watch face - and unlike most third party ones, easy on the battery on my Moto 360.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey David. Thanks for the positive feedback and 5 stars rating :)!

title: Nice!

comment: My favorite watch face so far.  Love the green night mode, looks great!  Looking forward to any additional updates.   (Moto 360)

comment: Great watch faces.  Big fan of anything tacticool...I second the comment on changing the 1200 position to Orange tritium or something.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Benjamin. Thanks for the positive feedback and 4 star rating :)! Will consider your idea when updating SpecOps.

title: The best

author: Bernie Zhao
comment: Much better and image is sharper now.  A bit more shadow and realistic would be better

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Bernie. We have just upgraded SpecOps Watch Face. Now, there are 6 faces to choose from :) They are sharper now, as requested. Hope you will like one of them. If so, please consider giving us more "stars" :)

title: Not sharp

author: Anthony du Toit
comment: I was hoping for a little more customization, particularly with night mode... It's also not green :(

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Anthony. Ambient is green - on watches, which have got the classic (color) ambient mode available. Probably, your watch has got only low-bit ambient and that is why it's black and white. Maybe, we will introduce new ambient modes (adapted to each watch face) in the future. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Night mode?

author: David Stepp
comment: It would be great if you could make different color faces (like orange).

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey David. Thanks for the positive feedback and 4 star rating :)! Will consider your idea when updating SpecOps.

title: Great watchface

author: Andi Darmika
comment: Looks good on my LG Urbane. Can you add setting for adjusting the brightness setting on ambient mode and also adjusting the color.

author: Rahul Dhaka
comment: Nice clean app face, different modes look great! Especially love the ambient mode.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Rahul. Thanks for the positive feedback and 5 stars :)!

title: Love it!

author: Corey Watford
comment: Great Watch face but...really would like to see a black watch face vs the Dark grey that actually was included.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Corey. Please tap and hold your watch's screen and afterwards enter settings by tapping small gear icon below SpecOps picture / icon. Choose the desired color (by taping on thumbnails) and swipe watch’s screen from left to right to get back to the watch face. Enjoy :)!

title: Great Watch face but...

author: Peter Fincken
comment: I love this watch face. It looks great when it is live and even better when it sleeps

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Thank you. We love the night mode as well :)

title: Sleek & stylish

author: Ted Van Atta
comment: Is there anyway to keep the watch face live and not let it go to ambient?

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Ted. Thanks for the very positive feedback :) Please try to disable ambient mode in your Android Wear watch's settings. Hope it will help.

comment: As others have said, more customisation options would be great.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Geron. Thanks for the positive feedback and 5 stars rating :)! Will consider your request when updating SpecOps.

title: Looks awsome

author: Alex Van Buren
comment: After some initial installation issues, its working and it great!

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Alex. Thanks for the positive feedback and 5 stars :)!

title: Great

author: Marcus kuak
comment: Any instructions to setting night mode ?thank you.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Marcus. Please make sure if the ambient mode in enabled in your watch's settings (Android Wear). Each time your watch enters ambient mode, you will see the night mode. Hope it will help :)

title: How to set night mode ?

author: Momen Elwan
comment: Just got the brown version , where are the others ?

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content:
Hey Momen, It will be my pleasure to help :) You have to enter settings directly on your watch.
Just tap and hold your watch's screen and afterwards enter settings by tapping small gear icon below SpecOps picture / icon.
Choose the desired color (by taping on thumbnails) and swipe watch’s screen from left to right to get back to the watch face :)

title: Nice

comment: Looks good but it should be more editable.

author: Eric Sison
comment: Military style dial is similar to a Seiko I wear. Second hand sweep is the smoothest I've seen compared to other watch faces. Just a few missing features I'd like to see like an orange lume for ambient mode, and a 24-hour hand. Also, I have an LG Urbane and can't find the settings to try out the other dial (unsupported watch so this could be a bug).

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Eric, Thank you for your valuable feedback. Will try to improve SpecOps watch face shortly - when we finish the brand new watch, we are working on right now :)

title: A few features from a 5-star face

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Chris. We have just upgraded SpecOps Watch Face. Now, there are 6 faces to choose from :) Hope you will like one of them.

title: Only face that doesn't show up
